Introduction


HWAITING (Korean: 화이팅; Japanese: ファイティング) was a South Korean girl group under AJA Entertainment, consisting of four members: Shinju, Woomi, Yuni and Hanbyeol. They debuted on December 30, 2019.

They are presumed to have silently disbanded as their social media has remained inactive since 2021 and their website no longer exists.
